storyInfo: While passing by, Ebenholz and Kreide save Hibiscus, but the cello Kreide borrowed from Czerny is damaged in the process. The concert draws closer and closer, but the duo have yet to earn Czerny's acknowledgement.

attributes.content: Andante tries his best to stop the tide of people approaching Hibiscus, but what a single person can do is limited.
The crowd quickly passes by Andante and surrounds Hibiscus.
Don't make me repeat myself – outta my way!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: What are you people trying to do?! She's here to help you, so why are you doing this?!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with you, Andante! If you're gonna protect this devil, then get her outta the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected
Kreide
attributes.content: What——

attributes.name: Kreide
attributes.content: What's going on here?
Kreide? Hibiscus is in there... They're mobbing her!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Move, out of the way! Let me inside!!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Huh? What hole did you crawl out of?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Oh, I remember now. You're the kid who drifted into the Afterglow not too long ago, right? Be a nice lad and go back to taking care of your opa, and don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Hibiscus only came here to help all of you! Why are you treating her like this?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: People like you will never understand. We're protecting our homes from the devils, so get lost!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Hibiscus isn't like that!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: All I know is that Hibiscus is here to treat Oripathy, and she's whole-heartedly devoted to it. Can't you all see that?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Treat Oripathy? Whose Oripathy is she here to treat?
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Kreide, you don't need to get involved with this! This is Vyseheim after all, they wouldn't dare––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wouldn't dare what?!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: The cello?!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Are you out of your mind?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you've got a problem, come at me! What are you flinging Arts at him for? What's any of this got to do with him?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I... I wasn't trying to––
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Why the hell do we have to answer to you? Get outta here, or we're gonna put a hole in your body just like we did with this cello here!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Someone's playing the flute?
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Who wants a piece of us next, huh? Show yourself!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: My... My heart won't stop pounding...
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: Scheiße, why'd he have to show up here...?
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Hey, where are all you people going? Why are you...?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Did you not hear that sound?
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: Wait... Could it be? Don't tell me it's––
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: P-Please have mercy on me, I–– I just had a bit too much to drink. I absolutely meant you no disrespect...
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: ––What in the world am I doing?!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected
Hibiscus
attributes.content: The crowd...

attributes.name: Hibiscus
attributes.content: They were gone?
Kreide, are you alright? You're not hurt, are you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm fine, but my cello...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Oh no... The body's been damaged so badly. Can it be fixed?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Thanks for coming to my aid.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't mention it.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It's a pleasure to meet you–– Or perhaps, 'meet' wouldn't be the right word. However, I haven't had a chance to say hello until now.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: To be honest, you were in quite a bit of danger back there. Even though the Afterglow is technically part of Vyseheim, your average patrolman has no desire to come around here.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: If they really decided to attack you, there's a good chance nobody would've come to help you for a while.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Then I must thank you again. And to whom do I owe the pleasure?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Just call me Ebenholz.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Then, Ebenholz, have you heard of the prophecy they were talking about?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Not even once. Just caught wind of it from the crowd here.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: In other words, this prophecy hasn't reached the Cliffy Patio at all...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The Cliffy Patio?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: That's where all the nobles in Vyseheim live, right?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't lump me in with the lot of them.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Huh? But aren't you Vyseheim's...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm actually not a native of Vyseheim.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Besides, it's discourteous to casually speculate about a noble's identity.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Then did you come all the way into the Afterglow to perform in Mr. Czerny's concert? Are you also an Infected?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Sorry, but I don't have Oripathy.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But I heard from someone that only Infected are performing––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's enough chit-chat for now.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Are you in a hurry?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Of course I am.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Kreide and I were going to Herr Czerny's house to have him assess our practice today, but then all this broke out.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Sorry for wasting your time.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll be heading back to the office now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright, don't start moping on me. Let's head to Mr. Czerny's first. I'm sure he'll find you a new instrument, seeing as how he's so fond of you.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Come, I was only joking around.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: But that sure is strange. I haven't heard about 'His Majesty's Prophecy' or anything of the sort.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Could it have been Gertrude?)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I think I've heard something along those lines before... But only very vaguely, and there never was any mention of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Well, whatever. The concert is the only thing that matters.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What a quaint group of people though. If they really care so much, they should head to the door of the Empresses' Voice and start hollering 'His Majesty, His Majesty.' Now that would be a fun show.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But, let's set that aside for now and head to Mr. Czerny's place.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But, my cello...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I already told you, Mr. Czerny will get a new one for you.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Besides, it's not your fault. Even if Mr. Czerny wanted you to pay him back for that cello, you've still got me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: The cello is broken?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What, did the two of you decide to jump into a fight?!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: No, that's not what happened–
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Then what happened, Kreide?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Ebenholz and I ran into Hibiscus while we were on our way here.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: She was surrounded, attacked by a group of people, calling her a devil and saying that she'd bring disaster to the Afterglow.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What nonsense.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I was trying to defend her, and... the cello got blasted by somebody's Arts.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Casting Arts out in the open streets? What's going on in peoples' heads these days?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And so you managed to beat them back?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: No, Ebenholz dispersed them with his Arts, and helped get me and Hibiscus out.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: He helped you?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Alright, I have a clear picture now.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: This poor cello... Alas, it was the only decent one I had.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Don't apologize, you didn't do anything wrong. If anything, I should be the one apologizing to you on behalf of the Afterglow for those idiots.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In any case, just put the cello over here. I'll go look around and see if there's anything suitable for you to use.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: All that's left is this mass-produced one.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You'll have to make do with it. Now let's hear how much you've progressed in your practice.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Begin!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Herr Czerny... What'd you think of that?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I won't say there was no improvement.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And considering how the two of you have only been practicing for a day, I shouldn't expect too much.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But it doesn't seem that any of the problems from before have been fixed.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: None of the problems from before have been fixed? How could that be––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: You're reacting a lot faster now, Ebenholz, but you're still getting carried away in your own passages as if you're trying to show off. In the end, you still need Kreide to accommodate you.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You're not even familiar with the music yet, so what are you trying to show off for?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And then there are those ornaments. You managed to hit them all, but it's making your breathing completely uneven. What's the point of that?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Kreide, on the other hand, is more solid in comparison. His main problem is insufficient mastery, something that can be solved with more practice.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But at the end of the day, 'Morgen und Abend' is a duet. It is impossible for one person to constantly be accommodating the other.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In all honesty, I would prefer to strike 'Morgen und Abend.'
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Herr Czerny...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: How about this, can we try again with you accompanying Ebenholz on piano?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Are you sure that's a good idea?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I won't be playing around him like you do. Don't blame me if he makes an utter fool of himself.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It'll be fine.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Whispers) Chipper up. I know you can settle this in one go.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Are you ready?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: ––How's that!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Herr Czerny...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Your braggadocio hasn't changed at all. What do you take your flute for? A tool to help you show off?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I had no intention of matching your rhythm at all, but you more or less managed to stay steady throughout your part.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It's clear to me now that while Kreide IS accommodating you, he's covering for your bad habits rather than for a lack of skill.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: While there's still ample room for improvement, you've at least met my minimum threshold.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: So that means...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You pass.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Fantastic!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Lets out a long sigh)
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I won't pull my punches though. I've already had to lower my standards to rock bottom today.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I may ask you to show me your progress at any time. If you're still playing at this level before the concert, I will not let you step onto that stage. Am I clear?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Rest assured!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Additionally, Kreide, you're playing on a mass-produced instrument right now, and it is only for emergency use. I would still recommend you find something else.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But the one you gave me is...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll cover you.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Let's go shopping tomorrow morning. I'll get you the very best.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gullible Infected

attributes.content: So I was telling you about His Majesty, right? His Majesty's prophecy!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: No foolin'? Tell me more about it while we walk. I'd like to hear it again, in detail...
attributes.name: Gullible Infected
